casebody.data:
In the Matters of K.H. and P.D.D. No. 204A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2006. Charlotte W. Nallan, for Buncombe County DSS. Michael Tousey, for Guardian Ad Litem. Katharine Chester, for Father.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of May 2006 by Guardian Ad Litem Program for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of May 2006."
